revised_title: Vibrational Excitation and Quenching of Singlet Molecular Oxygen
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the efficiency of vibrational excitation and quenching of singlet molecular oxygen. They measured the infrared chemiluminescence and kinetics of relaxation to understand the rates of formation and quenching of vibrationally excited molecules. The results provide insights into the energy transfer and relaxation processes in molecular systems.
